    $(document).ready(function(event) {
        var searchForm = $('#search-form');

        searchForm.find('[name="s"], .sg-icon-button').on('click', function (event) {
            if (event.which == 10 || event.which == 13 || $(this).hasClass('sg-icon-button')) {
                searchForm.submit();
            }
        });
    });
</script>

        <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-bold title--size-extramedium title--density-semismall color-darkest">FTP</h3> 
        <div class="flex hfull"> 
         <div class="grid2 grid--autoflow-row grid--gap-responsive"> 
          <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest"> La siguiente guía explica qué es FTP y cómo usar los clientes FTP más comunes para transferir archivos de manera conveniente. </p>

       <div class="sg-container sg-container--elevation-1 sg-container--padding-responsive"> <span class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_48 sg-icon--color-salmon sg-icon--fill-lighter acenter">

        <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-bold title--size-extramedium title--density-semismall color-darkest">phpMyAdmin</h3> 
        <div class="flex hfull"> 
         <div class="grid2 grid--autoflow-row grid--gap-responsive"> 
          <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest"> Lee cómo administrar fácilmente tu base de datos MySQL, cómo ejecutar consultas MySQL y varias otras operaciones con la herramienta phpMyAdmin. </p> 
          <div class="flex flex--justify-center"> <a href="/tutoriales/tutoriales-phpmyadmin/" class="sg-button sg-button--secondary sg-button--medium sg-button--outlined mtauto"> <span class="sg-button__content">Lee más</span> </a> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
     </div> 
    </section> 
   </section> 
  </div> 
  <section id="chat-popup" class="chat-popup background-wrap border-plus-shadow highspot" style="display: none;"> 
   <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-medium title--line-top-left title--weight-bold title--cap color-white title--subtitle-density-small mt20"> ¡Hola! </h2> 
   <div class="grid2 grid--gap-medium background-wrap"> 
    <div class="abstract-half-dot abstract-whole-dot--small-circle abstract-whole-dot--small-radius abstract-half-dot--top-circle abstract-half-dot--negative-right-circle"></div> 
    <div class="abstract-half-dot abstract-whole-dot--small-circle abstract-whole-dot--small-radius abstract-whole-dot--negative-bottom-circle abstract-half-dot--negative-left-circle"></div> 
    <p class="text text--size-medium color-white"> ¡Estaremos encantados de ayudarte a elegir el plan de hosting para tu proyecto! </p>
